briefTitle: The Validity and Reliability of Self Measurement of Upper Limb Volume
officialTitle: The Validity and Reliability of Self Measurement of Upper Limb Volume in Treating Lymphedema in Breast Cancer Patients
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Comparison of self measurement of limb volume to water displacement
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Women with arm edema after breast cancer who are being conservatively treated by a physiotherapist.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Active malignant disease
